thread.section_title: Ace Ticket Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Ticket | www.aceticket.com | 2 of 197
thread.title: Ron

author: Ron
title: Ron
text: First time buying a ticket to a sporting event online. Was very skeptical at first because you always hear about people getting scammed. Looked up Ace ticket and found they've been in business for a while. Plus they're local in the Boston area so I felt comfortable purchasing from them! The process was simple and very quick! Received my ticket in the mail early. I will be purchasing my Boston sports tickets from Ace from now on!! Thanks and go Patriots!!!
